test.name: As a user I want to verify that all Camera setting options

kw.name: Given : user logs in to Lyric app
kw.msg: [PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on name:OK
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on name:Allow
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on xpath://XCUIElementTypeTextField[contains(@value,'https')]
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on name:Return
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on name:Done
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on LoginButton
[PASS] Login To Lyric : Email Address set to - testaccount@mailinator.com
[PASS] Login To Lyric : Password set to - Password1
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on NAME:Login_Button
[PASS] Login to Lyric : Successfully navigated to HomeScreen

kw.name: When : user clicks on "HAMBURGER MENU" button
kw.msg: [PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on GlobalDrawerButton

kw.name: And : user clicks on "DAS DEVICE" menu
kw.msg: [PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on name:Security

kw.name: And : user clicks on "BASE STATION SETTINGS" menu
kw.msg: [PASS] swipe up to focus on Base station menu was successfull
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on BaseStation_Option

kw.name: And : user clicks on "CAMERA SETTINGS" menu
kw.msg: [PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on Base_StationCamera

kw.name: Then : verify the display of following:
kw.msg: [PASS] MOTION DETECTION is displayed
[PASS] MICRO PHONE is displayed
[PASS] NIGHT VISION is displayed
[PASS] VIDEO QUALITY is displayed

kw.name: When : user enables "CAMERA MICROPHONE"
kw.msg: [PASS] CAMERA MICROPHONE enabled already

kw.name: Then : verify "CAMERA MICROPHONE" is enabled
kw.msg: [PASS] CAMERA MICROPHONE is enabled

kw.name: When : user disables "CAMERA MICROPHONE"
kw.msg: [PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on CameraMicrophone_Switch
[PASS] Microphone Pop is displayed
[PASS] Click on Element : Successfully click on OK_button
[PASS] CAMERA MICROPHONE disabled

kw.name: Then : verify "CAMERA MICROPHONE" is disabled
kw.msg: [PASS] CAMERA MICROPHONE is disabled
